item.title: Angsana now offers allergy testing specifically for Asians
item.description: Angsana Molecular & Diagnostics Laboratory announced a partnership with Thermo Fisher Scientific to offer allergen sensitivity tests tailored for the Asian population. These tests, utilizing Thermo Fisher’s ImmunoCAP technology and conducted by Phadia Laboratory Systems, address the growing understanding that allergen sensitivities can differ across ethnicities and geographical regions due to factors like genetics, environment, diet, and social behaviors. Angsana aims to create and validate specific allergen sensitivity tests meeting local needs by leveraging the high specificity, sensitivity, quantitative results, quality, and extensive allergen menu of ImmunoCAP technology.
